    • Uses of Cleanable in com.radirius.mercury.graphics

      Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics that implement Cleanable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Batcher
      An OpenGL batcher that manages and pushes vertices.
      class  FrameBuffer
      An object that allows you to 'draw to a texture.' Good for end-processing effects.
      class  Graphics
      An object used to simplify rendering for those who do not wish to use the batcher.

    • Uses of Cleanable in com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font

      Subinterfaces of Cleanable in com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Font
      An abstraction for all font types.
      Classes in com.radirius.mercury.graphics.font that implement Cleanable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BitmapFont
      A font type for loading bitmap fonts.
      class  TrueTypeFont
      A font type for .TTFs and .OTFs.

    • Uses of Cleanable in com.radirius.mercury.scene

      Classes in com.radirius.mercury.scene that implement Cleanable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicEntity
      A base for all Entities that have a function in a Mercury game's environment.
      class  GameObject
      A scene graph node.
      class  GameScene
      A basic scene graph containing hierarchies of GameObjects.
      class  ShapedEntity
      An entity that's wrapped around a shape.

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Entity
      An abstraction for entities, objects which are initialized, updated, rendered and cleaned up.
